http.body: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><request API_version="1.0" client="test app" client_ver="1.1" namespace="{{{connection.http.unencrypted.namespace}}}" key="{{{connection.http.unencrypted.apiKey}}}">  <Auth>    <Login>      <company>{{{connection.http.unencrypted.companyId}}}</company>      <user>{{{connection.http.unencrypted.userId}}}</user>      <password>{{{connection.http.encrypted.password}}}</password>    </Login>  </Auth>  <Read type="User" method="all" limit="{{{export.http.paging.skip}}},1"/></request>
